info.name: Manged Learn
info.description: The ML Reports Service Postman Collection is a comprehensive resource for interacting with the ML Core Service. It includes organized endpoints, detailed documentation, and example workflows, providing a valuable reference for developers. Leverage this collection to enhance productivity and collaboration in ML Services.

item.name: ML Core Service
Public
User Extension
item.description: This module will help to find programs by platfom and role and user extension

All of these APIs are public and designed for consumption by both the app and portal. They require the inclusion of an X-authenticated-user-token and public Authorization keys for authentication. It's important to note that these APIs are specifically to handle user-specific data.

item.name: Private

item.description: All of these APIs are private and designed for consumption by the Support team create resource and modify existing resource on platform. They require the inclusion of an X-authenticated-user-token, private Authorization keys and internal-access-token for authentication. It's important to note that these APIs are specifically to handle data on platform.

item.name: Internal

item.description: All these APIs are intended for internal usage, meant to be consumed by various components within the managed learn system. These APIs necessitate the inclusion of an internal-access-token as a mandatory parameter. In certain cases, an X-authenticated-user-token is also required to access user-specific details via these internal APIs.

item.name: External
item.description: These APIs are integral components within distinct sections of the Sunbird building block, playing a crucial role in the functioning of the managed learn system. Authentication for these APIs involves the use of an X-authenticated-user-token and public Authorization keys.

The ML Core Service Postman collection will encompass four distinct sub-collections, each applicable to specific user roles. Within this collection, the focus will be on facilitating the creation of programs and resources under the Manage Learn.

item.name: ML Reports Service
Public
item.description: All of these APIs are public and designed for consumption by both the app and portal. They require the inclusion of an X-authenticated-user-token and public Authorization keys for authentication. It's important to note that these APIs are specifically to handle user-specific data.

item.name: Private
item.description: All of these APIs are private and designed for consumption by the Support team create resource and modify existing resource on platform. They require the inclusion of an X-authenticated-user-token, private Authorization keys and internal-access-token for authentication. It's important to note that these APIs are specifically to handle data on platform.

item.name: Internal

item.description: All these APIs are intended for internal usage, meant to be consumed by various components within the managed learn system. These APIs necessitate the inclusion of an internal-access-token as a mandatory parameter. In certain cases, an X-authenticated-user-token is also required to access user-specific details via these internal APIs.

The ML Reports Service Postman collection will encompass four distinct sub-collections, each applicable to specific user roles. Within this collection, the focus will be on facilitating the creation of reports in the Manage Learn.

item.name: ML Survey Service
Public
item.description: All of these APIs are public and designed for consumption by both the app and portal. They require the inclusion of an X-authenticated-user-token and public Authorization keys for authentication. It's important to note that these APIs are specifically to handle user-specific data.

item.description: All of these APIs are private and designed for consumption by the Support team create resource and modify existing resource on platform. They require the inclusion of an X-authenticated-user-token, private Authorization keys and internal-access-token for authentication. It's important to note that these APIs are specifically to handle data on platform.

item.name: Internal
item.description: All these APIs are intended for internal usage, meant to be consumed by various components within the managed learn system. These APIs necessitate the inclusion of an internal-access-token as a mandatory parameter. In certain cases, an X-authenticated-user-token is also required to access user-specific details via these internal APIs.

The ML Survey Service Postman collection will encompass four distinct sub-collections, each applicable to specific user roles. Within this collection, the focus will be on facilitating the creation and consumption of observation and survey under the Manage Learn.

item.description: All of these APIs are private and designed for consumption by the Support team create resource and modify existing resource on platform. They require the inclusion of an X-authenticated-user-token, private Authorization keys and internal-access-token for authentication. It's important to note that these APIs are specifically to handle data on platform.

item.name: Internal
item.description: All these APIs are intended for internal usage, meant to be consumed by various components within the managed learn system. These APIs necessitate the inclusion of an internal-access-token as a mandatory parameter. In certain cases, an X-authenticated-user-token is also required to access user-specific details via these internal APIs.

item.name: External
item.description: These APIs are integral components within distinct sections of the Sunbird building block, playing a crucial role in the functioning of the managed learn system. Authentication for these APIs involves the use of an X-authenticated-user-token and public Authorization keys.

The ML Project Service Postman collection will encompass four distinct sub-collections, each applicable to specific user roles. Within this collection, the focus will be on facilitating the creation of micro-improvements under the Manage Learn.
